org.springframework.integration.dsl.core

Interface ComponentsRegistration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRouterSpec, AggregatorSpec, AmqpInboundChannelAdapterSpec, AmqpInboundGatewaySpec, AmqpMessageChannelSpec, AmqpPollableMessageChannelSpec, AmqpPublishSubscribeMessageChannelSpec, BarrierSpec, BaseHttpInboundEndpointSpec, ConsumerEndpointSpec, CorrelationHandlerSpec, DelayerEndpointSpec, DirectChannelSpec, EndpointSpec, ExecutorChannelSpec, FileTransferringMessageHandlerSpec, FileWritingMessageHandlerSpec, FilterEndpointSpec, FtpInboundChannelAdapterSpec, FtpMessageHandlerSpec, GatewayEndpointSpec, GenericEndpointSpec, HttpControllerEndpointSpec, HttpMessageHandlerSpec, HttpRequestHandlerEndpointSpec, ImapIdleChannelAdapterSpec, ImapMailInboundChannelAdapterSpec, JmsMessageChannelSpec, JmsPollableMessageChannelSpec, JmsPublishSubscribeMessageChannelSpec, JpaBaseOutboundEndpointSpec, JpaInboundChannelAdapterSpec, JpaRetrievingOutboundGatewaySpec, JpaUpdatingOutboundEndpointSpec, KafkaMessageDrivenChannelAdapterSpec.KafkaMessageDrivenChannelAdapterListenerContainerSpec, KafkaProducerMessageHandlerSpec.KafkaProducerMessageHandlerTemplateSpec, LoadBalancingChannelSpec, MailInboundChannelAdapterSpec, MessageChannelSpec, PollerSpec, Pop3MailInboundChannelAdapterSpec, PriorityChannelSpec, PublishSubscribeChannelSpec, PublishSubscribeSpec, QueueChannelSpec, QueueChannelSpec.MessageStoreSpec, RecipientListRouterSpec, RemoteFileInboundChannelAdapterSpec, RendezvousChannelSpec, ResequencerSpec, RouterSpec, ScatterGatherSpec, ScriptMessageSourceSpec, SftpInboundChannelAdapterSpec, SftpMessageHandlerSpec, SourcePollingChannelAdapterSpec, SplitterEndpointSpec, WireTapSpec

    public interface ComponentsRegistration
    The marker interface for the IntegrationComponentSpec implementation, when there is need to register as beans not only the target spec's components, but some additional components, e.g. subflows from RouterSpec.

    Just for internal use only.

    Author:
    Artem Bilan
